EmailTemplate.subject: Upgrade to Turbonomic 6.1 for Application-Aware Workload Automation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, I hope this note finds you well! I’m following up on the email I sent to you last week, offering a free assessment of your environment through the lens of Turbonomic 6.1. We’ve received amazing feedback on the release from customers who have taken advantage of this upgrade, and I want to make sure you don’t miss out on the ability to leverage our improved product functionality. As a reminder, some of the updates you can benefit from include:
- Maximized Reserved Instance Utilization in AWS - Application-Aware Infrastructure Management through Integration with AppDynamics - Self-Managing Container Platforms, across Kubernetes, Red Hat OpenShift and Pivotal Cloud Foundry - Executive Dashboards Showing Performance Improvements and Savings
If you’re interested in exploring 6.1 with a Turbonomic engineer, please reply to my email so we can schedule time to connect.
Best,
Steve
Steve Corndell
GM and VP of Commercial Sales
Turbonomic
